titleStmt.title: A remonstrance of His Excellency Thomas Lord Fairfax, Lord Generall of the Parliaments forces. And of the Generall Councell of officers held at St Albans the 16. of November, 1648. Presented to the Commons assembled in Parliament, the 20. instant, and tendred to the consideration of the whole kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Partridge and George Whittington; in Black Fryers at the gate going into Carter Lane, and at the blue Anchor in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf bears "His Excellencies letter to the House of Commons" on recto.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.

place.placeName: Black Fryers at the gate going into Carter Lane
